title: Vice President Biden to Deliver Syracuse University Commencement Speech; Visit Local Elementary School | whitehouse.gov
content:
The White House




May 08, 2009

 



Vice President Biden to Deliver Syracuse University Commencement Speech; Visit Local Elementary School




THE WHITE HOUSE Office of the Vice President    -------------------------------------------  For Immediate Release                   May 8, 2009   **MEDIA ADVISORY**   Vice President Biden to Deliver Syracuse University Commencement Speech; Visit Local Elementary School On Sunday May 10th, Vice President Biden will deliver a commencement address to graduates, family members, and faculty at Syracuse University. The Vice President, a graduate of Syracuse University College of Law, will also be presented with an honorary degree, a Doctor of Laws, from the University. Syracuse University has a satellite window booked via ABC News One from 9:25AM-12:00 NOON EDT on Sunday that will cover the entire ceremony, including the Vice President’s address. Outlets accessing these coordinates will be able to pull down the live, five-camera coverage at that time. Coordinates: Time:  9:25 AM -12:00 NOON EDT  Galaxy 17    16A  downlink: 12005.000 Vertical  Data 5.5  Bandwidth 5.0  Audio 6.2   6.8    Afterwards, at 12:45 PM, the Vice President will visit with students and teachers at the Bellevue Elementary School. Both of these events are OPEN PRESS. Additional media details are included below. Media Details:     Vice President Biden to Deliver Syracuse University Commencement Speech Location:      The Carrier Dome                     900 Irving Avenue                     Syracuse University Campus                     Syracuse, NY Media Entrance:    Please enter the Carrier Dome at Gate J   Sat Truck Parking: Live Truck parking is located in the Dome lot. Trucks cannot run cable, but connections will be provided on site to receive live feeds. Camera Arrival:    6:00-7:00 AM  Press Arrival:        7:00 AM  Final Access:         8:00 AM (No exceptions will be made)  Event Begins:        9:30 AM Cable Run:         Cable run from press riser to cable feed is 150 feet  Throw:             150 feet    RSVP:              This event is OPEN PRESS.  Media must RSVP with the NAME, POSITION (Reporter, TV Camera, Photog, etc) MEDIA OUTLET, PHONE AND EMAIL for each person planning to cover the event to press@ovp.eop.gov  by Friday May 8 at 5 PM.  At the event, you will be required to wear your outlet’s media credential at all times, either around the neck or pinned to clothing.  In your RSVP, please indicate which event your outlet plans to cover.  Contact for logistical and planning purposes only: Nora Cohen, 215-850-5602 Workspace and event coverage space will be provided in the Press Box  Wireless internet is available. ### Vice President Biden To Visit Local Elementary School Location:          Bellevue Elementary School                         530 Stolp Ave                         Syracuse, NY 13207 Media Entrance:    Main Entrance to Bellevue Elementary School Sat Truck Parking: Live truck parking is on Stolp Avenue, and will be directed on arrival. Live trucks must bring cable ramps.   Media Parking:     There is no on site media parking. Media should park on the street near the school. Camera Pre-set:    7:30 am – 8:30 am (Media must drop equipment at the site by 8:30 am. Media will not have access to the site from 8:30 am – 10:30 am) Media access:      10:30 am   Final Access:        11:15 am  Event Begins:        12:45 pm   Cable Run:         500 feet  Throw:               40 feet RSVP:              This event is OPEN PRESS.  Media must RSVP with the NAME, POSITION(Reporter, TV Camera, Photog, etc) MEDIA OUTLET, PHONE AND EMAIL for each person planning to cover the event to press@ovp.eop.gov  by  Friday May 8 at 5 PM.  At the event, you will be required to wear your outlet’s media credential at all times, either around the neck or pinned to clothing.  In your RSVP, please indicate which event your outlet plans to cover.  Contact for logistical and planning purposes only: Nora Cohen, 215-850-5602 *No workspace is available on site. *No internet is available on site. ###
